schema:description:
Papers, brochures, photographs, maps, and digital materials relating to the Historical Preservation of Glen Alpine Springs, Inc., a non profit corporation that in conjunction with the United States Forest Service, preserves, restores, and educates the public about the national and historical resources of Glen Alpine Springs, located in South Lake Tahoe, California. 

 The full finding aid is available at the [Online Archive of California](https://oac.cdlib.org/findaid/ark:/13030/c8b56sws).
schema:name: Glen Alpine Springs Collection, circa 1990-2010
schema:publisher: UC Davis Library, Archives and Special Collections
schema:sdPublisher: UC Davis Library, Archives and Special Collections
